website_summaries.verdict: If “you get what you pay for” is the highest praise users can give a cat carrier, it’s probably a good idea to look for a better carrier. Flimsy construction and loose door locks make this a hassle for cat owners and could put cats in a dangerous situation if they escape at the wrong time. At 18-inches long, it’s smaller than most carriers.
pros: Large side locking clips, which are essential in front-loading pet carriers should a cat prove reluctant to exit, or to disassemble quickly for storage
The metal door is removable and can swing open from the left or right side with a simple selection
cons: Flimsy construction means the carrier flexes widely
The door latches can loosen up, allowing the door to swing open, particularly with a determined escape artist, some users report
Larger cats may find it a tight fit
And returns can cost more than the carrier’s purchase price

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I worked to get Archie accustomed to the new case prior to using it on a trip. Archie is 8 or 9 lbs. I put down just the bottom of this case and cut some bedding from an old blanket and put inside. He immediately took to it and it is his primary sleep spot now. Days after, I attached the top of the case. He didn't seem to mind it at all and now he sleeps and chills in the complete unit. So I haven't used it on the road yet, but he has quickly claimed it as one of his favorite places.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Burklund

customer_reviews.title: Perfect carrier for your small dog , rabbit or cat
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because I have a 20 pound cat but this carrier is very sturdy . It was very easy to put together . well made and worked great for my 20 pound cat . I also use it for our rabbit since he was chewing thru other carries . Its wide and tall enough for a big cat or small dog . This arrived quickly and was packaged very well too .
customer_reviews.author: Mommy5

customer_reviews.title: Enough space and strong enough for my 25 lbs Maine Coon
customer_reviews.text: Already have one of these carriers and now bought one more. Best I like is you can take off the entire top to get to your pet, in case they are refusing to get out of it at the Vet's. Would buy again ! Easy to clean too. No problem to put my 25 lbs Maine Coon cat into it. Enough space !
customer_reviews.author: Marion Ganz

customer_reviews.title: Good value for medium-sized carrier
customer_reviews.text: I used this to send two small parrots to new owner. I divided the carrier and it worked great. Most of these type carriers are wonky-molded, more for looks than utility, but this one is more squarish in shape and it worked well. It is a bit lighter weight than some others, but that was fine for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Will not hold determined cats
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 cats literally bust out if this cage . Thank heavens I was not at the vets office . I would not suggest this cage at all
customer_reviews.author: David Lence

customer_reviews.title: Enclosure isn't the most secure
customer_reviews.text: The plastic tabs that hold the gate closed aren't the best. It seems cheaply made. I would go with the amazon one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Blue carrier for my handsome man😻
customer_reviews.text: Love it 😻 was easy to assemble. As someone who works in the vet field, THESE carriers with the easy snaps are prefered❤️ Beautiful color, great purchase🐾
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to assemble but once I got it put together, it works fine. Much lighter than our last carrier.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together  - great carrier for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat who weighs 16 lbs. She fits perfect in it and still has plenty of room. It was also very simple to put together - took about 5 minutes to assemble! Excellent value for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beachmom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart as I was carrying my cat. Cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma

customer_reviews.title: but works great, one of best carriers I've
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to put together, but works great, one of best carriers I've had
customer_reviews.author: DWeb

customer_reviews.title: A bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The crate doesn't seem very sturdy. I feel like bumping or dropping it accidentally once or twice could break the plastic bars on the side. The locking mechanism on the front and the gate seem flimsy as well.
customer_reviews.author: DaveH

product_meta.title: Ferplast Atlas 20 Cat and Dog Carrier
product_meta.description: Color:BlueIf you have to travel with your cat or small dog, here is an excellent product: Atlas 20 EL is sturdy, made of plastic and complete with safe door. Its handle on the top allows very easy moving. Fantastic to travel with all means of transport, the carrier is very safe thanks to the firmly fixed side locks: special ventilation grills allow air circulation. Choose the model in compliance with your pet's size. Maximum load: 17,64 lbs.
feature_bullets: Ergonomic handle and secure side locks
Made of sturdy plastic with plastic-coated door
Good ventilation ensured thanks to the suitable side grills
Manufactured and designed to guarantee pets' comfort and safety
